rounds.response:
I’ve watched P0 steamroll the last several hands with aggression, forcing folds every time. With 6-5 suitedconnecter from the small-blind, I’m far enough behind in chips that I should start trying to win some back, but 6-5o OOP vs P0’s current table image is not the hand to take a stand. Folding keeps the damage minimal and sets up better counter attacks in later hands.  

[Fold]
